name: Wayne Mwashuma
about: I’m a Full Stack Software Engineer who loves building things that live at the intersection of creativity and technology.I enjoy designing clean, scalable systems from responsive web apps to robust back - end services.When in game developer mode, I love experimenting with mechanics, physics, and interactive design to create engaging worlds that people can be immersed in .I thrive on turning ideas into reality, whether that’ s coding a new feature, prototyping a game mechanic or solving a complex technical challenge.

education.description: Modcom is a practical‐focused tech training hub in Westlands, Nairobi, offering hands-on courses in software dev, data science, cybersecurity, and IoT. With strong industry partnerships, flexible schedules, and real-world learning, it's ideal for those eager to quickly build employable tech skills

Multimedia University of Kenya (MMU) is a public university chartered in 2013, located in Karen, Nairobi. The university has faculties for Computing and Information Technology, where programs such as Software Engineering, Computer Science, and IT prepare students for careers in modern tech. These courses are supported by industry partnerships (e.g., Huawei, Google, IBM, Intel) and hands-on training in software labs, innovation hubs, and collaborative projects.
